architectural_elements.name: Stone Pathways
architectural_elements.description: Cracked stone walkways winding through overgrown weeds and tangled roots, slick with moss.

architectural_elements.name: Fountain
architectural_elements.description: A grand but decayed fountain at the courtyard’s center, filled with murky water and wilted petals.

architectural_elements.name: Iron Gate
architectural_elements.description: Tall wrought-iron gates with intricate patterns, rusted and partially open, creaking in the wind.

architectural_elements.name: Garden Walls
architectural_elements.description: Crumbled stone walls covered in ivy and old carvings, hiding niches and small alcoves.

architectural_elements.name: Archways and Columns
architectural_elements.description: Broken marble archways and leaning columns entwined with vines and thorny bushes.

furniture_and_decor.name: Stone Benches
furniture_and_decor.description: Weathered benches covered in moss and lichen, some cracked down the middle.

furniture_and_decor.name: Birdbath
furniture_and_decor.description: An ornate birdbath filled with stagnant water and floating leaves.

furniture_and_decor.name: Garden Statues
furniture_and_decor.description: Figures of angels and animals with broken wings or missing heads, their surfaces streaked by rain.

furniture_and_decor.name: Lamp Posts
furniture_and_decor.description: Tall iron lamps that flicker dimly, some still working, others shattered or unlit.

furniture_and_decor.name: Gravestone Markers
furniture_and_decor.description: Small, weather-worn stones near the edges of the courtyard, names barely legible.

atmospheric_details.name: Overgrown Vegetation
atmospheric_details.description: Thick weeds, ferns, and ivy choking the paths, moving slightly in unseen wind.

atmospheric_details.name: Falling Leaves
atmospheric_details.description: Dead leaves slowly drifting down from unseen trees above.

atmospheric_details.name: Crows and Ravens
atmospheric_details.description: Dark birds perched on statues and railings, occasionally cawing or flying away suddenly.

atmospheric_details.name: Soft Rain or Mist
atmospheric_details.description: A light drizzle or persistent fog hanging over the courtyard, muting all sound.

atmospheric_details.name: Moonlight Reflections
atmospheric_details.description: Pale light reflecting off puddles and the fountain’s surface, casting ghostly glows.

interactive_objects.name: Locked Garden Gate
interactive_objects.description: An ornate gate leading to another area, sealed with a rusted lock that may require a key.

interactive_objects.name: Statue with Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A cracked statue concealing a small compartment or puzzle mechanism.

interactive_objects.name: Weathered Journal Page
interactive_objects.description: A soggy page lying near the fountain, containing cryptic notes about the mansion’s past.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Lantern
interactive_objects.description: An old lantern near a bench, glass shattered but faintly glowing within.

interactive_objects.name: Cursed Flower
interactive_objects.description: A single strange flower glowing faintly, pulsing in rhythm with ambient sounds.

environmental_effects.name: Wind Gusts
environmental_effects.description: Sudden, strong bursts of wind that rustle foliage and extinguish candles or lanterns.

environmental_effects.name: Whispering Voices
environmental_effects.description: Soft whispers carried on the wind, seeming to come from the statues or trees.

environmental_effects.name: Animal Sounds
environmental_effects.description: Distant howls, croaks, or rustling in the bushes, hinting at unseen life.

environmental_effects.name: Shadow Movement
environmental_effects.description: Shadows shifting subtly across the garden, as if something is moving just out of sight.

environmental_effects.name: Faint Chiming
environmental_effects.description: The sound of wind chimes, though none can be seen.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Bright silver light illuminating parts of the courtyard, leaving others in darkness.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: Old iron lanterns hanging from posts or trees, their light flickering weakly.

lighting.name: Fireflies
lighting.description: Small glowing insects drifting lazily through the air, adding a faint green shimmer.

lighting.name: Lightning Flashes
lighting.description: Occasional bursts of light from distant storms, revealing the courtyard in stark contrast.
